name: The Sun And Moon (itch)
description:
The Sun And Moon
By Daniel Linssen

Made for Ludum Dare #29. Works best in Chrome and Opera. May contain bugs.
If you use another browser please consider downloading the Windows Version.

Now on Steam!

A + D / Left + Right: move left and right
W / Up / Spacebar: jump
L Shift / R Shift / Z: action
Esc: exit to level select / exit to title screen
R: restart level
M: mute/unmute audio
